name: micro-survivors
description: tiny survivors-like game embeddable on any website

scripts.minify:js: uglifyjs -m -c --mangle-props keep_quoted --name-cache main.mangle-cache.json -o main.min.js main.js && html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-attribute-quotes --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --use-short-doctype --minify-css --minify-js index.src.html -o index.html && html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-attribute-quotes --minify-css true index.src.html > index.html

author: Jan Zipek <jan@zipek.cz>
